objects.specification: A low-profile rectangular floor surface with a subtly textured finish in light gray. The surface is smooth with a slight anti-slip pattern, designed to span a 6 by 4-meter area, providing a durable, uniform base for the showroom environment.

A tall rectangular back wall panel featuring a smooth, neutral light gray finish. At 2.5 meters in height, it provides a clean vertical backdrop, constructed from sturdy, lightweight materials with minimal thickness for stability.

A side wall panel with a smooth and consistent off-white gray finish, measuring 4 meters wide and 2.5 meters tall. The panel is rigid yet lightweight, providing a stable boundary while maintaining a sleek appearance.
A mirrored side wall panel in the same neutral light gray tone, 4 meters wide and 2.5 meters tall. The finish is smooth and uniform, offering a cohesive structural frame for the booth.

A centrally placed reception counter with a crisp, high-gloss bright red finish. The rectangular counter features clean edges and a sturdy base, measuring 1.5 meters wide, 0.6 meters deep, and 1 meter tall, serving as a focal meeting point.

A tall, narrow display shelf finished in a vibrant blue powder coat. It features a slim profile 0.5 meters wide by 2 meters tall, with multiple open shelving levels and a minimalistic frame for product presentation.
An identical tall display shelf with a bright blue finish, slim and modern in design. The structure is lightweight yet sturdy, providing multiple tiers of open shelving for showcasing items.
A small round table with a 1-meter circular top and a warm brown finish. The table has a slender central pedestal and a stable base, designed for conversational seating with two chairs.
A matching round table with a smooth wooden surface and central support column. It provides an intimate setting for two chairs, with a durable brown finish.
An identical 1-meter diameter round table with a sturdy pedestal base and rich brown finish. Perfect for small group interactions.
A modern chair with a gently curved backrest and cushioned seat, coated in a fresh green hue. The slim metal frame provides support while maintaining a lightweight appearance.
A duplicate green chair with a curved back and cushioned seat, featuring the same ergonomic design and slender frame for two-person seating.
A contemporary green seating chair with cushioned comfort and a gentle back curve, supported by a minimalist metal frame.
An identical green chair matching the other seating units, combining ergonomic form with a sleek frame.
A green cushioned chair with a curved backrest, sleek metal legs, designed for comfort and visual cohesion with the table group.
A matching green seating chair with cushioned support and a gently curved back, complementing the round table arrangement.
A decorative vertical banner made of lightweight fabric, featuring bold multicolor stripes in alternating bright hues. The striping pattern is vivid and eye-catching.
An identical fabric banner with bright multicolor stripes and a lightweight, slightly translucent texture, adding visual interest to the back wall.
A compact ceiling-mounted spotlight fixture with a cylindrical housing, emitting a soft yellow beam. The adjustable head allows precise targeting of the reception counter.
A matching soft yellow spotlight with an adjustable swivel head, designed to illuminate the reception area from the front right corner.
A back-left mounted spotlight with a soft yellow glow, featuring a compact design and directional beam to highlight the left display shelf.
An identical back-right spotlight emitting a soft yellow beam, adjustable to focus on the right display shelf for balanced illumination.
A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage emerging from a simple terracotta pot. The foliage is dense and natural-looking, adding an organic accent to the booth corner.
